strings.string:
%%processing_error%%
£%%transaction_amount%% Pounds Sterling (GBP) are about to be debited from your card
Card Number %%card_number%%
Expiry Date (MM/YY) %%card_expiry_month%% / %%card_expiry_year%%
  %%submit_button%% %%reset_button%% %%cancel_button%%
The Datacash API does not have the required DataCash_Document class
The Datacash API's DataCash_Document class does not contain the required readDocumentFromString() method
No amount is specified for the payment
No card number is specified for the payment
The expiry date (MM/YY) is not valid
The start date (MM/YY) is not valid
The issue number is invalid (must be one or two digits long)
The Datacash CardInfo Directory does not contain CardInfo1.bin or CardInfo2.bin file
No CV2 is specified for the card
The card CV2 is invalid (must be three or four (only American Express Card) digits long)
The street address is not specified
